title: My vocal range is D2-B4 ? What type of voice do I have? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have the same vocal-range as you, and I have been described as a baritone. Albeit my top and bottom notes are not the easiest to pull off, I can usually hit them consistently. However, your vocal classification depends on more than just your range. If you have a heavier voice but are still able to sing higher notes with relative ease, then you might be a baritone, like I am!

You are a bass or a bass-baritone. If your D2 is nice and clean then you are a bass most certainly. Great luck, that’s the rarest male voice! No baritone will have clean d2 in a chest voice and tenors usually start having troubles lower than B2
